name: Display a message if the search string does not match any case
id: search_for_shipments_by_customer:Display a message if the search string does not match any case

testSteps.description: Given There are 5 shipments, one from customer MyStuff, one from customer MySofa and 3 from customer Stuff24
When I show the list of current shipments
And I enter "abc" into the search input field
Then I see a message "no shipment found for 'abc'"

userStory.narrative:
In order to find a specific shipment for a customers (e.g. when the customer is calling)
As a transport specialist
I want to quickly identify the shipment concerning the customer

featureTag.name: Search for shipments/Search for shipments by customer

title: Display a message if the search string does not match any case
